testcase.name: THPE-0023
testcase.summary: Check SQL injections in url browser bar on Home page when page almost loaded.

step.actions: Fill in url bar with data: https://en.shishi.co.il/index.php' OR '1'='1
step.expectedresults: Does not display SQL syntax error or new incorrect data

step.actions: Fill in url bar with data: https://en.shishi.co.il/index.php' UNION SELECT * FROM users --
step.expectedresults: Does not display SQL syntax error or new incorrect data

step.actions: Fill in url bar with data: https://en.shishi.co.il/index.php' UNION SELECT database() --
step.expectedresults: Does not display SQL syntax error or new incorrect data

step.actions: Fill in url bar with data: https://en.shishi.co.il/index.php' UNION SELECT user() --
step.expectedresults: Does not display SQL syntax error or new incorrect data
